name: Do You Believe?
description:
Do You Believe? 

This game isn't like your normal adventure game. It's a singleplayer game that takes you through a poetic short story with the intent of making you think about the way society is written. It takes only a couple minutes to finish, but I would suggest soaking the experience in for just a little while longer. 

It's time for work.

Controls:
ESC - Pause/Unpause
E - Use
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look Around
